rukus.text: hananimkkeseo seuseuloleul wihae ttaldeul-eul taeghasigo neohuineun adeul-eul seontaeghadolog hayeossdan mal-inyo
jabilousin hananimkke biyuhaess deon sosig-i geudeul-ege ileulttaemyeon geu ui eolgul-eun eodueojimyeo gip-eun seulpeum eulo gadeug chadeola
jangsig-eulo yang-yugdoen geunyeodeul-eul hananimkke biyuhalyeo hana geugeos-eun hananimgwa biyuhal iyuga doeji mos haji anhneunyo

geuligo bulsinjaneun jabilousin hananim-ui jongdeul-in cheonsadeul-eul yeoseong-i la hadeola geudeul-eun cheonsadeul-i changjo doel ttae moggyeog-ilado hayeossdan mal-inyo geudeul-ui jeung-geoneun gilogdoeeo jilmun-eul badge doelila
geudeul-eun jabilousin hananimkkeseo wonhasyeossdamyeon jeohuineun gyeolko geugeos deul-eul sungbaehaji anihaess-eulilago malhana geudeul-ui mal-eneun jisig-i eobs neun geojismal-ila
animyeon hananimkkeseo geudeul-ege igeos ijeon-e seongseoleul jueo geudeullo hayeogeum geuleohge ttaleudolog haessdan mal inyo
geuleohji anhnola jeohuineun jeohui seonjodeul-i ttalassdeon jong-gyoleul balgyeonhayeo geudeul-ui gil-eul seuseulo ttaleul ppun-ibni da lago geudeul-eun malhadeola

hananim-i geudae ijeon baegseongdeul ege gyeong-gojaleul bonaess-eul ttaemada geu deul jung-ui buyuhan salamdeuldo jeohuineun jeohui seonjodeul-i ttalassdeon jong-gyoleul bal gyeonhayeo geudeul-ui gil-eul ttaleul ppun-ibni da lago hadeola

modeun seonjijaneun neohuiga seonjo deullobuteo balgyeon han geosboda deo na-eun bog-eum-eul gajigo wassnolago malhaess-euna bulsinjaneun dangsindeul-eul tonghayeo bonaeeojin geos-eul midji anhneunda malhadeola
geulihayeo hananim-i geu beol-eul naelisini bola jinlileul geoyeoghaneun jadeul-ui malloga eotteo haessdeonyo
